ComicInfo.Summary:
The second issue of Vanguard Illustrated sports an amazing cover by industry legend Dave Stevens, and continues its tradition of pairing established professionals with new writers and artists.
*Story Titles* Legends of the Stargrazers by Campiti, Wood and McCleod Encyclopedias part 2 "Sales Call" by Baron and Rude The Guest by Darren Auck Freakwave part 2 "With Ceaseless Turmoil Seething..." by Milligan and McCarthy
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/vanguard-illustrated-2/4000-23902/
